name: JaJaDi Training
author: Janjaap van Dijk

sections.description:
With this plugin you can add a Training and associated Courses to your WordPress site.
With a widget you can get a sorted list by date of the Training.

In newer versions there is an agenda with the training and an opportunity to add subscription forms at the training and an e-learning module.
sections.installation:
Install from WordPress Dashboard

  • Log into WordPress dashboard then click Plugins > Add new >
    • Then under the title “Install Plugins” click Upload > choose the zip > Activate the plugin!
    • Or Search for JaJaDi Training and click Install > Activate the plugin!

Install from FTP

  • Upload /jajadi-training/ to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

What now?

  1. Choose in settings if you want to use Courses
  2. Add a Training and Courses. See also the screenshots section
  3. Go to Appearance > Widgets and drag the JaJaDi Training widget to the sidebar.
sections.faq:
I have a Question

You can find answers to your questions, suggest a feed, or just drop us a line at Support section.

Can you add my language to this plugin?

Yes we can. Go to Transifex login or create an account and go to the project JaJaDi / Training and Courses and go translate. The next update we will add your translation to the plugin.

short_description: With this plugin you can add training and courses to your WordPress site.
description:
With this plugin you can add a Training and associated Courses to your WordPress site.
With a widget you can get a sorted list by date of the Training.

In newer versions there is an agenda with the training and an opportunity to add subscription forms at the training and an e-learning module.

upgrade_notice.0.5.7: This version we checked the compatibility for Wordpress 3.8 and updated the helptext.
upgrade_notice.0.5.6: This version fixes the Courses under training on the frontpages, also added french language.
upgrade_notice.0.5.5: This version fixes the Select date in Training and the Summery field in Courses, we also update the Dutch translation and add the Russian language(by sorrymak).
upgrade_notice.0.5.4: This version fixes the Select date in Training, we also update the Dutch translation and add more strings to translate.
upgrade_notice.0.5.3: In this version we update the look and feel of the settings page. We also update the way to select courses in edit Training.
upgrade_notice.0.5.2: This version fixes the ordering months in the widget.
upgrade_notice.0.5.1: This version fixes the 'Select Courses' when it is not in use.

screenshots.caption: Overview on the front side. Left side you see the training and the Courses connected to it. Right side you see the widget with all the training, sorted by month.
The settingspage. You can chose here with sub modules you want. Now only Courses.
Overview of the courses, by the courses you can use categories and tags.
Select date is to show the training in the widget. Select Courses is to assign the right courses to the Training.
